title: Change Statement Delivery to Paperless
description: A customer wants to stop receiving paper statements in the mail and switch to e-statements.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their accounts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and their checking and savings accounts.

tasks.description: Confirm the customer's email address for e-statement notifications.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the email address on file is correct.

tasks.description: Update the statement delivery preference for all accounts to 'Paperless'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the settings and informs the customer the change is effective immediately.
